response.original_title: Every Single Adam Sandler Movie Ranked
response.overview: Acclaimed Youtube reviewer James Phryllas (a.k.a Schaffrillas Productions) goes through the pain (and ocassional joy) of reviewing and ranking every movie the comedian/actor Adam Sandler has partaken a significant role in.
response.tagline: I don't have a joke for this tagline, this was too painful.
response.title: Every Single Adam Sandler Movie Ranked
